content: {"version":2,"machineId":"832bddac-9d90-47e7-ae43-cd54061eae7d","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaults\\n[\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+tab\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.focusNext\\\",\\n    \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+tab\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.focusPrevious\\\",\\n    \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+n\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.new\\\",\\n    \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n  },\\n  {\\n    \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+w\\\",\\n    \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.kill\\\",\\n    \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminalFocus\\\"\\n  }\\n]\"}"}
